name: cardio-node
description: Keep your apps in shape with cardio
author: Arvind Kumar <arvind@enkrypt.in> (https://arvind.io)

scripts.build: tsdx build --target node && rm dist/cardio-node.cjs.development.js dist/cardio-node.cjs.development.js.map dist/index.js && cp ./production-index.js dist/index.js
scripts.prepublishOnly: tsdx build --target node && rm dist/cardio-node.cjs.development.js dist/cardio-node.cjs.development.js.map dist/index.js && cp ./production-index.js dist/index.js
